title: PPG completes COLORFUL COMMUNITIES project in Bursa, Turkey (PPG Industries Inc)
text: ( Source : PPG Industries Inc) PITTSBURGH, Oct. 23, 2015 - PPG Industries ( NYSE : PPG ) today announced the completion of a COLORFUL COMMUNITIESâ„¢ charitable-giving project in Bursa, Turkey , which helped revitalize the Bursa Merkez Learning Unit
